titleStmt.title: The case of John Burrowes draper and George his son, Joshua Morris gent. Elizabeth his wife, Christopher Potter, gent. and Phillis his wife, Sarah Burrowes and Martha Burrowes, spinsters; which said John, Elizabeth, and Phillis, Sarah, and Martha, were brother and sisters, and legatees of George Burrowes of London merchant, deceas'd
titleStmt.author: Burrowes, John, fl. 1693-1715.

notesStmt.note: Docket title: 'The case of John Burrowes, &c.'.
On the debt of Sir Alexander Rigby to John Burrowes et al.
